channel.title: Trade Block Command
channel.description:
Could someone please make me a quick command using ::tradeblock "username" that stop thats player from being able to Trade for 48 hours. Make the rights 1 please.
Thank you.

item.title: Trade Block Command
item.dc:creator: @dslayer40 dslayer40
item.description:
@dslayer40 wrote:

Thanks for giving me a code with errors? Well ok here i am asking for help now. I fixed your first error as it is suppose to be this
if (command.startsWith(“block”) && (playerRights >= 1)){

instead of this
if (command.startsWith(“block”) && (playerRights >= 1) {

Now I get these two errors, how can I fix them?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02,

Read full topic

item.title: Trade Block Command
item.dc:creator: @U_WAN_DIE U WAN DIE?
item.description:
@U_WAN_DIE wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:8, topic:223449”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=293501.msg2361930#msg2361930 date=1217649145]
of course its fucking possible, you rs2 noobs are such idiots if just because you don’t see it on tuts its not possible. Wow
[/quote]
then tell him the code for it?[/quote]I used to hate this community, thought the smart people never helped, so I left for rune-~~server for a bit. Sure I learned lots of things, but then I came back and realized, getting advanced help is here. I asked James for help on a single thing, he tells me the noobiest response ever, but I ask someone smart here, and I get a full explanation, you people here just want a quick answer so you can get on with what you’re doing. You could care less if you learned this as long as you ask people who know this. It gets so irritating being the baby sitter when only the person being treated gets the better end. IF YOU WANT HELP, ASK IN A SMART WAY, TELL US WHAT YOU HAVE ATTEMPTED TO DO AND WHAT YOU THINK IT HAS TO DO WITH. True smart questions last more than 3 paragraphs.

You wanted a command? Here you go, fix the errors yourself

if (command.startsWith("block") && (playerRights >= 1) { client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(5))]; c.tradeBlock = 1; c.tradeBlockdate = lastlogintime; c.disconnected = true; c.savechar(); c.savemoreinfo(); }

Read full topic
